de.ralleytn.simple.audio

Class BufferedAudio

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.audio.AbstractAudio
      • de.ralleytn.simple.audio.BufferedAudio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Audio, Playable

    public class BufferedAudio
extends AbstractAudio
    Reads the entire audio data into the RAM. Good for small sound effects.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)
